file.name: example-with-security-nodes.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: example service
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:12000

paths:
  /item:
    post:
      description: create an item
      security:
        - multipass: []
      parameters:
        - in: header
          description: Bearer Auth
          name: Authorization
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/PostBody"
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item'
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /item/{id}:
    head:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: item found
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    delete:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '204':
          description: deleted
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: item found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item"
        default:
          description: error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  requestBodies:
    PostBody:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: 'common.yaml#/components/schemas/Item'
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        messageIndex:
          type: number
      required:
        - message
        - messageIndex
  securitySchemes:
    multipass:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: requestBodies: "PostBody": parse content: application/json: schema: parse schema: at 1:93: external "common.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
